attributes.comment:
I totally oppose this ruling to increase the rates for "Petition to Classify Orphan as
an Immediate Relative". My husband and I are in the process of adopting from
China and the fees that we've already had to pay are quite enough. All we want to
do is give an unwanted child a home and complete our family and the costs
involved in doing so are already expensive enough. What you do need to work on
is extending the expiration of the I-171H to 24 months instead of 18 months as the
time to process the adoptions from China and other countries are steadily
increasing. Please reconsider this ruling and make it easier rather than difficult for
families wanting to give children a home & future.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Valerie Kolle
